attributes.action: Make it compulsory in order to help reduce the pollution produced by the United Kingdom for any –
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
a)	New Build’s to include small roof mounted wind turbines and rain water storage containers appropriate to size of individual properties.

b)	The Environment Agency funded by the Government/Private Sector (means tested) to finance all existing buildings, whether residential or commercial to install small roof mounted wind turbines and rain water storage containers appropriate to size of individual properties.
